caption: A man climbed out of the window, and the girl approached to inspect. The man reached the ground. There was a parade on the street with a woman holding a bouquet chatting with a man in the dressing room. A man walked through the parade, making his way to the stage. He performed on the stage, and the audience cheered for him. Then, another woman came up, holding a microphone. She turned around to welcome a girl who also joined the stage. A group of people carried a giant balloon. The girl took out a piece of fruit from her bag and walked forward.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
